languages.text: Эти ксеносы явно мертвы, однако их тела почему-то не исчезли. Возможно что-то повредило механизмы, отвечавшие за телепортацию их останков.
These xenos are clearly dead, but for some reason, their bodies have not vanished. Perhaps something has impaired the mechanisms that transport their remains upon death.
languages.original_text: Эти ксеносы явно мертвы, однако их тела почему-то не исчезли. Возможно что-то повредило механизмы, отвечавшие за телепортацию их останков.

traits.locale_text: These xenos are clearly dead, but for some reasons, their bodies did not vanish. Perhaps something has impaired the mechanisms that transport their remains upon death.
These xenos are clearly dead, but for some reasons, their bodies did not vanish. Perhaps something has impaired the mechanisms that transport their remains upon death.
These xenos are clearly dead, but for some reason, their bodies have not vanished. Perhaps something has impaired the mechanisms that transport their remains upon death.
These xenos are clearly dead, but for some reason, their bodies have not vanished. Perhaps something has impaired the mechanisms that transport their remains upon death.
These xenos are clearly dead, but for some reason, their bodies have not vanished. Perhaps something has impaired the mechanisms that transport their remains upon death.

languages.text: 很显然，这些异形已经死了，但出于某种原因，它们的尸体并没有消失。或许是有什么东西破坏了它们的机制，阻止它们的遗体被运送回去。
languages.original_text: These xenos are clearly dead, but for some reason, their bodies have not vanished. Perhaps something has impaired the mechanisms that transport their remains upon death.

traits.locale_text: 很显然，这些异形已经死了，但出于某种原因，它们的尸体并没有消失。或许是有什么东西破坏了它们的机制，阻止它们的遗体被运送回去。

languages.text: 異種族たちは明らかに絶命しているが、なぜか彼らの死体は消えてはいなかった。恐らく彼らの死亡時に残骸を転送する機構に何か不具合があるのだろう。
languages.original_text: These xenos are clearly dead, but for some reason, their bodies have not vanished. Perhaps something has impaired the mechanisms that transport their remains upon death.

traits.locale_text: 異種族たちは明らかに絶命しているが、なぜか彼らの死体は消えてはいなかった。恐らく彼らの死亡時に残骸を転送する機構に何か不具合があるのだろう。

languages.text: Ces xénos sont clairement morts, mais pour une raison qui vous échappe, leurs cadavres n'ont pas disparu. Quelque chose a peut-être altéré les mécanismes qui transportent leurs dépouilles lorsqu'ils meurent.
languages.original_text: These xenos are clearly dead, but for some reason, their bodies have not vanished. Perhaps something has impaired the mechanisms that transport their remains upon death.

traits.locale_text: Ces xénos sont clairement morts, mais pour une raison qui vous échappe, leurs cadavres n'ont pas disparu. Quelque chose a peut-être altéré les mécanismes qui transportent leurs dépouilles lorsqu'ils meurent.

languages.text: Está claro que estos xenos están muertos, pero, por alguna razón, sus cuerpos no han desaparecido. Es posible que algo haya alterado los mecanismos que transportan sus restos al morir.
languages.original_text: These xenos are clearly dead, but for some reason, their bodies have not vanished. Perhaps something has impaired the mechanisms that transport their remains upon death.

traits.locale_text: Está claro que estos xenos están muertos, pero, por alguna razón, sus cuerpos no han desaparecido. Es posible que algo haya alterado los mecanismos que transportan sus restos al morir.

languages.text: Diese Xenos sind eindeutig tot, aber aus irgendeinem Grund sind ihre Körper nicht verschwunden. Vielleicht hat etwas die Mechanismen gestört, die ihre Überreste nach ihrem Tod abtransportieren.
languages.original_text: These xenos are clearly dead, but for some reason, their bodies have not vanished. Perhaps something has impaired the mechanisms that transport their remains upon death.

traits.locale_text: Diese Xenos sind eindeutig tot, aber aus irgendeinem Grund sind ihre Körper nicht verschwunden. Vielleicht hat etwas die Mechanismen gestört, die ihre Überreste nach ihrem Tod abtransportieren.

languages.text: Bu zenoların öldüğü kesin ama nedense bedenleri ortadan kaldırılmamış. Belki bir şey, öldüklerinde kalıntılarını taşıyan mekanizmayı bozmuştur.
languages.original_text: These xenos are clearly dead, but for some reason, their bodies have not vanished. Perhaps something has impaired the mechanisms that transport their remains upon death.
